results.title: BBC News - Syrian held in Germany over attack plan
results.summary: German police arrest 17-year-old Syrian suspected of planning suicide attack in Berlin
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/ddb75078-b47b-7945-8619-e31a5beb5284"><image id="91952625"/><paragraph role="introduction">German police arrest 17-year-old Syrian suspected of planning suicide attack in Berlin </paragraph><paragraph><italic>This breaking news story is being updated and more details will be published shortly. Please refresh the page for the fullest version.</italic></paragraph><paragraph><italic>If you want to receive Breaking News alerts via email, or on a smartphone or tablet via the BBC News App then details on how to do so are available on </italic><!-- CPS Asset ID: 40096755 --><link><caption>this help page</caption><altText>BBC News App Help Page</altText><url platform="highweb" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/10628323"/></link><italic>. You can also follow </italic><!-- CPS Asset ID: 40096757 --><link><caption>@BBCBreaking on Twitter</caption><altText>@BBCBreaking Twitter Account</altText><url platform="highweb" href="http://twitter.com/BBCBreaking"/></link><italic> to get the latest alerts.</italic></paragraph></body>
